entry.title: Case against ex-officers in George Floyd's death will be difficult, State AG says

media:group.media:title: Case against ex-officers in George Floyd's death will be difficult, State AG says
media:group.media:description: Minnesota Attorney General Keith Ellison announces charges against all four ex-police officers involved in the arrest and subsequent death of George Floyd.

entry.title: Charges announced against all ex-officers in Floyd case

media:group.media:title: Charges announced against all ex-officers in Floyd case
media:group.media:description:
Minnesota Attorney General Keith Ellison announces charges against all four ex-officers involved in the arrest and subsequent death of George Floyd.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Donte Stallworth: Trump is throwing gas on the fire

media:group.media:title: Donte Stallworth: Trump is throwing gas on the fire
media:group.media:description: CNN's SE Cupp and journalist Donté Stallworth discuss President Donald Trump's response to protesters across the US who have gathered in response to the death of unarmed black man George Floyd at the hands of a police officer in Minneapolis, Minnesota. #CNN #News

entry.title: All four ex-officers charged in George Floyd case

media:group.media:title: All four ex-officers charged in George Floyd case
media:group.media:description:
The former Minneapolis Police officer who pressed his knee into George Floyd's neck was charged with second-degree murder and the three other officers on scene during his killing are charged with aiding and abetting second-degree murder, according to court documents.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Defense Secretary breaks with Trump on invoking Insurrection Act

media:group.media:title: Defense Secretary breaks with Trump on invoking Insurrection Act
media:group.media:description: Secretary of Defense Mark Espers breaks with President Donald Trump and says he does not support using active duty troops to quell protests following George Floyd's death. #CNN #News

entry.title: Saint Paul Police chief: You can ‘decry’ injustice and support police

media:group.media:title: Saint Paul Police chief: You can ‘decry’ injustice and support police
media:group.media:description: CNN's Poppy Harlow spoke with Saint Paul Police Chief Todd Axtell, who said that any police officer who thought the video of George Floyd's arrest showed an "acceptable" use of force should hand in their badge. #CNN #News #usnews #happeningnow

entry.title: Atlanta student gets emotional describing violent arrest

media:group.media:title: Atlanta student gets emotional describing violent arrest
media:group.media:description: Students Messiah Young and Taniyah Pilgrim describe their arrests which resulted in six Atlanta Police officers being charged with use of excessive force. #CNN #News#usnews #happeningnow

entry.title: GOP lawmaker who made past racist remarks loses primary, CNN projects

media:group.media:title: GOP lawmaker who made past racist remarks loses primary, CNN projects
media:group.media:description:
Nine-term Congressman Steve King of Iowa will lose his Republican primary race to state Sen. Randy Feenstra, CNN projected, after King's racist comments led to his ostracization in Washington and Feenstra mobilized conservative Republicans to his insurgent campaign.
The primary fight was an undeniable referendum on King -- not on his conservatism, but on his effectiveness in office. His lack of power, far more than his specific words and history of remarks on race, became a central issue in this year's race, with opponents arguing that he is unable to represent their views in the House or to the administration.
King, an anti-immigration hardliner, had a well-documented history of controversial statements during his nine terms in office. But only after a New York Times interview in January 2019, in which the congressman questioned how "white nationalist, white supremacist, Western civilization" became offensive, did House Republican leaders rebuke him by stripping him of his committee assignments. Last June, the Trump administration barred him from Air Force One when the President visited his state.
#SteveKing #CNN #News

entry.title: Have extremists infiltrated the protests? The answer is complicated

media:group.media:title: Have extremists infiltrated the protests? The answer is complicated
media:group.media:description: While authorities seek to figure out who's responsible for the destruction in their metro regions, CNN finds protests across the country are made up of a vast majority of non-violent demonstrators, but also an unorganized combination of looters, troublemakers, protesters and those that don't seem to fit any category, like the Boogaloos. CNN's Drew Griffin reports. #GeorgeFloyd #CNN #News

entry.title: Trudeau was asked about Trump. See how long it took him to respond

media:group.media:title: Trudeau was asked about Trump. See how long it took him to respond
media:group.media:description:
A reporter asked Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau about smoke canisters and pepper balls being used on US protesters so that President Trump could have a photo-op in front of a burned church near the White House.
#Trudeau #CNN #News

entry.title: Reverend describes being pushed out from church for Trump photo-op

media:group.media:title: Reverend describes being pushed out from church for Trump photo-op
media:group.media:description:
Rev. Gini Gerbasi, the rector at St. John's Episcopal Church of Georgetown, said she was at the scene when police fired smoke canisters and pepper balls to disperse the crowds so that President Donald Trump could walk over to the church and take photos.
#CNN #News

entry.title: See congressman's dire warning about US democracy

media:group.media:title: See congressman's dire warning about US democracy
media:group.media:description:
Rep. James Clyburn (D-SC) warns that the future of democracy in the US is at a "crossroads."
#CNN #News

entry.title: White supremacist group poses as Antifa on Twitter

media:group.media:title: White supremacist group poses as Antifa on Twitter
media:group.media:description:
A Twitter account that tweeted a call to violence and claimed to be representing the position of "Antifa" was in fact created by a known white supremacist group, Twitter said Monday. The company removed the account.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Video shows US police attack Australian journalists

media:group.media:title: Video shows US police attack Australian journalists
media:group.media:description:
During a live broadcast on Australian television, Channel 7 News journalists were struck by a policeman's riot shield, prompting the Australian government to ask for an investigation into the incident.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Joe Biden's Philadelphia speech calls for unity

media:group.media:title: Joe Biden's Philadelphia speech calls for unity
media:group.media:description: Presumptive Democratic presidential nominee Joe Biden blasted President Donald Trump's divisive rhetoric on the protests over the death of George Floyd. #CNN #News #politics #usnews #presidentdonaldtrump
